entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
